Pre-Game Insights: India and Sri Lanka tied the first ODI of the three-match series after nearly 98 overs of compelling cricket.
The second ODI of the three-match series will be held at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.
The pitch at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo wasn’t easy for the batter to get set, especially with the early swing and seam movement for the fast bowlers, followed by the turn for the spinners.
The average first-innings score of 225 in ODI cricket at this venue could prove to be tough for either Sri Lanka or India to chase down in the second match of the series.
